mosinstall.name: Header Image
mosinstall.author: Michael Pillwax
mosinstall.description:
This module allows to load a image based on the current user selection.
Store the images in the image path, define the prefix and file extension and if it shall be section,category or menu dependant.
Default Image will be shown in case there is no image file found, or a random image.
Plenty of additional features, read the documentation!
For full documentation see the Wiki on the projects homepage at Header Image on Joomla! Developer: http://forge.joomla.com/sf/projects/mode_header_image

param.name: LinkedTo
param.label: Linked to
param.description: Select if the images shall be linked to the current Section or Category ID

param.name: ImageFileType
param.label: Operation Mode
param.description: Select which type of files you want to use.

param.name: Slideshow
param.label: Slideshow Images with Smart-Mode
param.description: Select if images shall be rotated, like a slideshow. Requires SMART Mode to be selected.
param.option: Yes, rotate images with frequency below

param.name: Slideshow_Frequency
param.label: Seconds to show images
param.description: Define the time in seconds for each image to be shown with the ROTATE IMAGES feature.

param.name: Slideshow_Pause
param.label: Pause on Mouse over Images
param.description: Select if the slideshow shall be paused when the mouse is hovered above the images.

param.name: Slideshow_RandomOrder
param.label: Show images in random order
param.description: Select if the slideshow images shall be shown in random order.

param.name: Slideshow_Transition
param.label: Image transition type
param.description: Select the type of transition between images.

param.name: Slideshow_BackgroundColor
param.label: Slideshow Background Color
param.description: Enter the background color for the image slideshow, either as name (e.g. white) or as Hex-Value (e.g. #FFFFFF).

param.name: Localize
param.label: Use Localization
param.description: Enable localization support with Mambelfish. The Image Folder Names will be extended with the current localization code, example: /images/en_en/image....jpg

param.name: imagesFolder
param.label: Images Folder
param.description: Define the folder that will store your section and default images (NO LEADING OR TRAILING SLASH!)

param.name: ImagePrefix
param.label: Image Filename Prefix
param.description: Enter the Prefix for these image files, eg 'headerimg'.

param.name: ImageExtension
param.label: Extension of Files
param.description: Enter the file extension of the image or HTML-files. Use '.html' for HTML file use.

param.name: ComponentSpecificFiles
param.label: Use Component Filter
param.description: Allows to add the current component name (e.g. com_content, com_search, ...) to the image filename for component specific image selection. This has no effect onto the random images, their filenames or their location.
param.option: Yes - use the component name as image subfolder
Yes - suffix the component name with a underscore to the filename

param.name: UseAdefaultImage
param.label: Use a default image
param.description: Select if the default image shall be used if no related image was found, or if no image shall be shown.
param.option: No, supress output on missing relation

param.name: defaultImageFilename
param.label: Default Image Filename
param.description: Select a default image filename to use when a content or related image is not available.

param.name: ImageBorder
param.label: Size of Image Border
param.description: Set the size of the image border, applies to all images.

param.name: ImageAltText
param.label: Image Alt-Text
param.description: Enter any alternate text for the image, applies to all images. See documentation for multi-language support.

param.name: ImageToolTip
param.label: Show Image Tooltip
param.description: Enable JavaScrip ToolTip-Box, use the settings below for it. See documentation on required changes to your index.php template file to make the Tooltip Box work.

param.name: ImageToolTipTitle
param.label: Image Tooltip Box: Title
param.description: Enter the title of the Tooltip-Box, applies to all images. See documentation for multi-language support.

param.name: ImageToolTipText
param.label: Image Tooltip Box: Text
param.description: Enter any alternate text as Tooltip-Box for the image, applies to all images. See documentation for multi-language support.

param.name: ImageToolTipWidth
param.label: Image Tooltip Box: Width
param.description: Enter width for the Tooltip-Box in pixels.

param.name: ImageToolTipHeight
param.label: Image Tooltip Box: Height
param.description: Enter height for the Tooltip-Box in pixels.

param.name: ImageHyperLink
param.label: Hyperlink
param.description: Enter a hyperlink in case the image shall be a clickable link.

param.name: ImageHyperLinkOnDefault
param.label: Hyperlink with Default Image
param.description: Defines if the Hyperlink shall also be valid for the default image. On [Yes] the Hyperlink will only be generated for all other images, except the default.

param.name: UseRandomImage
param.label: Random default image
param.description: Select if a random default image shall be used if no related image was found.
param.option: Yes, use a random default image

param.name: RandomImagesFolder
param.label: Random Images Folder
param.description: Define the folder that will store your random images (NO LEADING OR TRAILING SLASH!)

param.name: Slideshow_RandomImagesNr
param.label: Nr. of images for a slideshow
param.description: Define the max. number of random images that shall be selected for a slideshow. Note: Slideshow feature has to be active for this to work.

param.name: HTMLCode
param.label: HTML Code (use '#__image' for files)
param.description: Enter the HTML Code you want the module to put into the template. Use '#__image' for the image file name, mod_headerimage will replace this with the generated filename.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: Debug
param.label: Debug Mode
param.description: Select if the module shall show debug information. Standard is OFF
